short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Online Weather featuring a weather search, todo list, notes, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get inspired and make your Google Chrome experience better by replacing your browser's New Tab page with the Online Weather Chrome New Tab extension featuring quick weather search, todo list, notes and more. Personalize your weather search experience by choosing your city or any city in the world. Easily access current weather conditions, hourly forecast and 5-day forecast from your New Tab page.

Online Weather extension updates your browser New Tab and provides you quick access to weather, todo list, notes, popular links, web search box and more in your browser New Tab. Customize your background and brighten your day with meaningful quotes.

• View and search for weather forecast
• Keep track of important tasks with the todo list
• Write down important notes throughout the day with the notepad
• Check the current time, date and weather conditions
• Browse the web and enjoy quick access to popular sites
• Customize the dashboard by showing/hiding widgets and changing the background with the settings icon at the bottom-left of your New Tab page.
• New tab web search results go to Yahoo!

Permissions we request:

"Read and change your data on a number of websites"
For our extension to work, we require access to these websites we own and manage.

"Replace the page you see when opening a new tab"
This allows us to show you our product - new tab page with free web search.

Privacy Policy: https://onlineweatherapp.com/Privacy.html
EULA: https://onlineweatherapp.com/Terms.html
